keyMoments.title: Kibagaeru Reveals Himself as New Captain
keyMoments.description: Kibagaeru emerges and announces that he is now the captain of the Sexy Foxy ship and crew, having taken over after Foxy's defeat in the previous Davy Back Fight.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the main antagonist for the Foxy's Return Arc. His takeover represents the consequences of losing a Davy Back Fight.
keyMoments.quote: I own this ship and everything aboard it now!

keyMoments.title: Deflects Foxy's Slow Slow Beam
keyMoments.description: Kibagaeru demonstrates his tactical abilities by using a shield made of swords to deflect Foxy's Slow Slow Beam back at him.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Kibagaeru's combat intelligence and ability to counter Devil Fruit powers through strategy.

keyMoments.title: Refuses to Fight Luffy Initially
keyMoments.description: Kibagaeru initially refuses to battle Luffy when he recognizes his 100 million Belly bounty, understanding the significant difference in their threat levels.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Kibagaeru's awareness of the pirate hierarchy and Luffy's growing reputation.

affiliations.note: Former captain before losing to Foxy
Joined after losing Davy Back Fight to Foxy, then staged mutiny in Episode 225

abilities.description: Uses a shield made of swords to deflect attacks, including Devil Fruit powers.
Wields a whip as his primary weapon in combat.

relationships.description: Kibagaeru took over Foxy's ship and crew after Foxy lost a Davy Back Fight. In Episode 225, Foxy challenges him to reclaim his position.

evolutionMoments.description: Kibagaeru reveals he has taken control of the Foxy Pirates and Foxy challenges him to a Davy Back Fight.

reveals.information: Former captain of the Fanged Toad Pirates who lost to Foxy and joined his crew
Can deflect Devil Fruit powers using a sword shield

keyMoments.title: Aokiji's First Appearance (Shadowed)
keyMoments.description: A mysterious figure is seen riding a bicycle across the ocean surface, holding Luffy's wanted poster. His face is blocked by the sun. He comments on how trouble seems to run in the Monkey family.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Admiral Aokiji in the anime, foreshadowing his upcoming confrontation with the Straw Hats and demonstrating his Ice-Ice Fruit powers that allow him to freeze the ocean.
keyMoments.quote: Trouble seems to run in the Monkey family.

abilities.description: Can freeze the ocean surface to ride his bicycle across it, demonstrating his Hie Hie no Mi (Ice-Ice Fruit) powers.

relationships.description: Aokiji shows interest in Luffy, holding his wanted poster and mentioning knowledge of the Monkey family, hinting at a connection to Luffy's grandfather Garp.

evolutionMoments.description: Aokiji is seen holding Luffy's wanted poster and commenting on the Monkey family's tendency for trouble.

reveals.information: Can ride a bicycle across the ocean by freezing the water with his Ice-Ice Fruit powers
Has knowledge of the Monkey family and seems to know about Luffy's connection to them
Operates independently and casually, leaving Marine Headquarters without authorization

keyMoments.title: Rescued by Straw Hats from Storm
keyMoments.description: Foxy, Hamburg, and Porche are rescued from a storm by the Straw Hats despite their previous antagonistic relationship.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the consequences of Foxy's earlier defeat and demonstrates Luffy's compassionate nature.

keyMoments.title: Foxy's Betrayal of Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: After recovering, Foxy betrays the Straw Hats who rescued him, dumping them through a trapdoor and announcing his plan to cash in on their bounties.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Foxy's character as an unscrupulous pirate, though played for comedy.
keyMoments.quote: I'm going to cash in on your bounty!

keyMoments.title: Challenges Kibagaeru to Davy Back Fight
keyMoments.description: Foxy challenges Kibagaeru to a Davy Back Fight to reclaim his ship and crew that he lost.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Foxy's pride and determination to reclaim what he lost, even when outmatched.

keyMoments.title: Gives Luffy the Championship Afro
keyMoments.description: In desperation, Foxy gives Luffy the afro that Luffy previously used in their boxing match, asking for his help.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Foxy swallowing his pride to ask his former enemy for help, and callbacks to the Long Ring Long Land arc.

affiliations.note: Lost captaincy to Kibagaeru before Episode 225

relationships.description: Kibagaeru took over Foxy's ship and crew. Foxy challenges him to reclaim his position through a Davy Back Fight.

evolutionMoments.description: Foxy discovers Kibagaeru has taken over his ship and crew, leading to a Davy Back Fight challenge.

relationships.description: Despite betraying Luffy earlier in the episode, Foxy asks for his help by giving him the championship afro.

evolutionMoments.description: Foxy gives Luffy the afro to help him fight Kibagaeru, asking his former enemy for assistance.
